name: @softmotions/postcss-typescript-css

0.2.1.name: @softmotions/postcss-typescript-css
0.2.1.description: PostCSS plugin to create a typescript file by each CSS file

scripts.pretest: npm run lint && npm run clean && tsc && npm run copyFakePostcssFile
